thread.title: US Energy Secretary Thinks Solar Can Compete With a Lower Federal Tax Credit
thread.title_full: US Energy Secretary Thinks Solar Can Compete With a Lower Federal Tax Credit

title: US Energy Secretary Thinks Solar Can Compete With a Lower Federal Tax Credit
text:
04 US Energy Secretary Thinks Solar Can Compete With a Lower Federal Tax Credit 
Greentech Media: The solar industry in the U.S. is primed to grow and survive even without the need for subsidy support, U.S. Energy Secretary Ernest Moniz has said this week.
